name: softinvest/tron-api
description: A PHP API for interacting with Tron (Trx)

suggest.ext-gmp: GMP is the preferred extension for big integer calculations
suggest.ext-bcmath: BCmath is the fallback extension for big integer calculations
suggest.phpseclib/bcmath_compat: BCmath polyfill for servers where neither GMP nor BCmath is available
suggest.ext-curl: For loading OID information from the web if they have not bee defined statically
